entities.name: hump
entities.description: Hump is introduced as the one who heaved himself inside and slid down to meet his bag at the bottom of the stone chute.

entities.name: marauder's map
entities.description: The Marauder's Map is described as a blank that Hump wiped again before setting off at a run.

entities.name: honeydukes
entities.description: Honeydukes is mentioned as the location where Harry emerged into sunlight outside of it.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: The Invisibility Cloak is described as what Harry was completely hidden beneath.

entities.name: high street
entities.description: The High Street is mentioned as the location where they set off to.

entities.name: post office
entities.description: The post office is mentioned as a location that Ron and Harry went to.

entities.name: bill in egypt
entities.description: Bill in Egypt is mentioned as the person who Ron pretended to be checking the price of an owl for.

relationships.description: Hump has the Marauder's Map, as he wiped it blank again before setting off at a run.
Ron and Harry went to the post office together.
Harry was completely hidden beneath the Invisibility Cloak.
Ron pretended to be checking the price of an owl for Bill in Egypt so that Harry could have a good look around.
